Package main

Class InteractController

java.lang.Object
main.InteractController
public class InteractController extends Object
That class controll the interactions between the map and the different Man objects.
Author:
Fernando Tarrino del Pozo (FernandoEsra)

  • Constructor Details

    • InteractController

      public InteractController()

  • Method Details

    • interactAll

      public static void interactAll(Board board, CitizenList citizenList)
      This method runs over a CitizenList object and performs a interaction for each of the citizens inside using the interactSpecific() method.
      Parameters:
      board - The map where the citizens move and interact.
      citizenList - A list with all the citizens on the map.

    • interactSpecific

      public static void interactSpecific(Board board, Man genericCitizen)
      This method took one 'genericCitizen' and search for his className. It then moves to the specific methods of that citizen.
      There are two types of jobs. Harvesting and Crafting.
      All the harvesting jobs interact always first.
      Parameters:
      board - The map to search for different things, such as the surroundings of the Man.
      genericCitizen - The citizen who will perform the action.

    • interactCarpenter

      public static void interactCarpenter(Board board, Man genericMan)
      This method cast the genericMan to a Carpenter. Then search the up, down, left and rigth coordinates for a Lumberjack. If a Lumberjack is found continue the method.

      If a Lumberjack is found then the Carpenter take all the WoodPlanks object (if any) and calculate the amount of wood in total.
      Then, whit that wood planks call the createFurniture() method.

      Parameters:
      board - The map to search for different things, such as the surroundings of the Man.
      genericMan - Must be a Carpenter object and exists in the board.

    • interactLumberjackFurniture

      public static void interactLumberjackFurniture(Board board, Man genericMan)
      This metod scan the up, down, left and right coordinates of the Lumberjack and if find a base.Furniture object inside call the method dismantleFurniture().
      Parameters:
      board - The board with the map to search for furnitures in the surroundings of the Lumberjack.
      genericMan - Must be a Lumberjack object and exists in the board.

    • interactLumberjackTree

      public static void interactLumberjackTree(Board board, Man genericMan)
      This metod scan the up, down, left and right coordinates of the Lumberjack and if find a base.Tree object inside call the Lumberjack.cutTree() method.
      Parameters:
      board - The board with the map to search for trees in the surroundings of the Lumberjack.
      genericMan - Must be a Lumberjack object and exists in the board.

    • interactMiner

      public static void interactMiner(Board board, Man genericMiner)
      This metod scan the up, down, left and right coordinates of the Miner and if find a mineral inside call the Miner.crushingMineral() method.
      Parameters:
      board - The board with the map to search for minerals in the surroundings of the Miner.
      genericMiner - Must be a Miner object and exists in the board.

    • interactBlacksmisth

      public static void interactBlacksmisth(Board board, Man genericBlacksmith)
      This metod scan the up, down, left and right coordinates of the Blacksmith and if find a Miner inside search for Mined gold in the miner inventory. If the miner have mined gold then the Blacksmith took that mined gold and melts them using the Blacksmith.melt() method.
      Parameters:
      board - The board with the map to search for Miners in the surroundings of the Blacksmith.
      genericBlacksmith - Must be a Blacksmith object and exists in the board.

    • createFurniture

      public static int createFurniture(Board board, int totalOfWoodPlanks, Carpenter actualCarpenter, Lumberjack adjacentLumberjack)
      This method fill the map with random furniture. Only create furniture if have enough wood planks to create the next items:
      4 wooden planks: 1 chair or 1 chest
      6 wooden planks: 1 table or 1 bed
      Parameters:
      board - The map to fill with furniture.
      totalOfWoodPlanks - The total of wooden planks the adjacentLumberjack have.
      actualCarpenter - The carpenter doing the action.
      adjacentLumberjack - Its necessary to register the adjacentLumberjack in case of leftover wood planks to return.
      Returns:

    • dismantleFurniture

      public static void dismantleFurniture(Board board, int actualX, int actualY, Lumberjack actualLumberjack)
      This item took a Lumberjack and a adjacent Furniture object then dismantle the object and return wooden planks to the Lumberjack.
      Parameters:
      board - The board used to call the eraseObjectAt() method.
      actualX - The X position of the furniture on the board.
      actualY - The Y position of the furniture on the board.
      actualLumberjack - The Lumberjack doing the action.

    • template

      public static void template(Board board, Man genericMan)
      This method is a template. It does nothing, do not use it.
      Parameters:
      board - The map to search for different things, such as the surroundings of the Man.
      genericMan - Must be a base.Man object.
